That certinatley didn't work. Upload it to dropbox.

Yes, I'm trying to figure out how dropbox works.

Any help would be appreciated.

If you want to make an account, go use Wikisend. You don't have to make an account, but the drawbacks are that there is a limit to the size of the upload and it is only up for 7 days. You can simply upload it like you would a picture.

Oh, I see, only one problem.

Wikisend always tells me something has gone wrong.

It just won't let me upload it.

Edited June 12, 2013 by Spaceisbeautifulul
I mean, you click on the "Upload" button and choose the thing you want to upload. It then gives you a link for forums that you can copy directly here.

well once in your dropbox go to you account then click share link were you get the link to shar for example:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/9396anbs1bvrs82/Gertyhubbugfixes.zip
AHA! I've got it! Now look at the top, could someone acess that and copy it to their KSP and play it?
